methods.getMessage: :return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.util.BarrageMessage) the BarrageMessage that this generator is operating on
methods.getSnapshotView:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Obtain a Full-Snapshot View of this StreamGenerator that can be sent to a single requestor.

*Overload 1*  
  :param options: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.BarrageSnapshotOptions) - serialization options for this specific view
  :return: (BarrageMessageProducer.StreamGenerator.MessageView) a MessageView filtered by the snapshot properties that can be sent to that requestor
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param options: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.BarrageSnapshotOptions) - serialization options for this specific view
  :param viewport: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - is the position-space viewport
  :param keyspaceViewport: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - is the key-space viewport
  :param snapshotColumns: (java.util.BitSet) - are the columns included for this view
  :return: (BarrageMessageProducer.StreamGenerator.MessageView) a MessageView filtered by the snapshot properties that can be sent to that requestor
methods.getSubView:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Obtain a Full-Subscription View of this StreamGenerator that can be sent to a single subscriber.

*Overload 1*  
  :param options: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.BarrageSubscriptionOptions) - serialization options for this specific view
  :param isInitialSnapshot: (boolean) - indicates whether or not this is the first snapshot for the listener
  :return: (BarrageMessageProducer.StreamGenerator.MessageView) a MessageView filtered by the subscription properties that can be sent to that subscriber
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param options: (io.deephaven.extensions.barrage.BarrageSubscriptionOptions) - serialization options for this specific view
  :param isInitialSnapshot: (boolean) - indicates whether or not this is the first snapshot for the listener
  :param viewport: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - is the position-space viewport
  :param keyspaceViewport: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSet) - is the key-space viewport
  :param subscribedColumns: (java.util.BitSet) - are the columns subscribed for this view
  :return: (BarrageMessageProducer.StreamGenerator.MessageView) a MessageView filtered by the subscription properties that can be sent to that subscriber

text:
A StreamGenerator takes a BarrageMessage and re-uses portions of the serialized payload across different
 subscribers that may subscribe to different viewports and columns.
